channel.title: Deer Tick Killers
channel.description: Leverage Gatsby Business Starter for your Business.

item.title: We Kill Ticks with Birds Who Like Eating Ticks
item.description: We have teams of thousands of birds that literally walk around all day eating ticks. We can cover miles of land a day given the opportunity to cleanse your community. Our birds are happy. They walk around all day eating bugs. Chickens and guineafowl love to do that. These are happy psycho-murdering birds.
item.dc:creator: Vaibhav Sharma
item.content:encoded:
We have teams of thousands of birds that literally walk around all day eating ticks. We can cover miles of land a day given the opportunity to cleanse your community.

Our birds are happy. They walk around all day eating bugs. Chickens and guineafowl love to do that. These are happy psycho-murdering birds.

item.title: We Kill Deer When Appropriate
item.description: Ticks depend on deer to survive in their second year of life. They are also over populated in most of the United States. In regions with high deer-tick populations, it is guaranteed there are high amounts of deer! We are not talking about Bambi here. We are talking about large, strong, fast, and overfed deer who continue to over-populate because of climate, environmental, and predator-less eco…
item.dc:creator: Vaibhav Sharma
item.content:encoded:
Ticks depend on deer to survive in their second year of life. They are also over populated in most of the United States. In regions with high deer-tick populations, it is guaranteed there are high amounts of deer!

We are not talking about Bambi here. We are talking about large, strong, fast, and overfed deer who continue to over-populate because of climate, environmental, and predator-less eco-systems.

We have a trained team of deer hunters with crossbows who literally kill as many deer as they are allowed to in a safe and sustainable fashion.
